channel.title: Product-Update on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in Product-Update on PlaceOS

item.title: June 2025 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: This month we shipped new features, improved existing capabilities, and resolved a number of bugs to deliver a more seamless user experience across our platform.

item.title: HID Mobile Access Now Available via PlaceOS WorkMate
item.description: You can now use your phone as your staff ID at supported offices â€” no fob required.

item.title: Building & Region-Level Workplace Management
item.description: Control workplace settings to standardize policies across buildings, so you can scale workplace management while ensuring the right settings for each location.

item.title: Room Booking Updates: Recurring Booking & Room Manager
item.description: Learn about the new recurring bookings feature in our room booking app. Streamline your scheduling process and enhance room management with ease.

item.title: December 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: December 2024 WorkMate updates include new parking utilization reports, kiosk customizations, recurring desk bookings, added language support and room alerts.

item.title: API Keys: Simplify Authentication for Apps & Devices
item.description: Simplify app integration with PlaceOS API Keys. Enable secure, authenticated server-to-server interactions, unattended panel access, and auto-login.

item.title: Auto Assign Desks & Car Spaces
item.description: Auto-assign desks by department and car spaces with ANPR integration for efficient visitor management.

item.title: Learn About Crystal v1.0.0 for Workplaces
item.description: Learn how Crystal Lang v1.0.0 enhances your workplace platform. Discover the benefits and improvements brought by this powerful programming language.

item.title: New Feature: Locking Booking
item.description: Explore PlaceOS’s Locker Booking System: Easy reservations, access control, visual booking, and flexibility for workplaces and visitor management.

item.title: September 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: New WorkMate features: email templates, parking management, QR code printing, room alerts, and a media library in our September release.

item.title: July 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: Non-bookable rooms now show real-time status, desk height management for Floorsense desks, and real-time parking availability.

item.title: Area Manager: Occupancy & Sensor Management
item.description: Discover how Area Manager optimizes occupancy sensor management for efficient space utilization. Enhance your workplace with advanced occupancy tracking.

item.title: Deployment via OpenShift
item.description: Learn how to streamline deployments with OpenShift and Kubernetes. Discover best practices for efficient and scalable application management.

item.title: Feature Enablement
item.description: Unlock the full potential of PlaceOS Backoffice with feature enablement. Learn how to enhance functionality and streamline operations in your workspace.

item.title: Indoor Air Quality Integration: Kaiterra
item.description: Enhance indoor air quality with Kaiterra integration. Learn how to monitor and improve air quality for healthier environments. Experience the difference today!

item.title: Indoor Wayfinding for your Workplace
item.description: Enhance workplace navigation with indoor wayfinding technology. Explore how these solutions can streamline movement and boost productivity in your office.

item.title: Introducing Event Manager
item.description: Introducing the Workplace Event Manager, your solution for seamless event planning and management. Optimize workplace events with our innovative tool.

item.title: Processing on the 'Edge'
item.description: Explore how edge processing transforms data handling and performance. See why processing on the edge is crucial for real-time analytics and faster decision-maki

item.title: Self Documenting API
item.description: Learn about the benefits of a self-documenting API for seamless integration and enhanced efficiency.

item.title: Support for Open Telemetry
item.description: Explore the power of Open Telemetry in monitoring and improving system performance. Learn how to implement Open Telemetry for better insights and efficiency.

item.title: Vergesense: Object Detection & Occupancy Workflows
item.description: Discover how VergeSense leverages object detection for accurate occupancy tracking. Enhance your workplace efficiency with advanced occupancy workflows.

item.title: Workplace Management App: New Features and Enhancements
item.description: Explore the new features of the refreshed Concierge workplace management app. Improve efficiency and optimize your workplace with our innovative solutions.

item.title: April 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: POI QR code support, public map kiosk, enhanced MapsPeople search, backoffice warnings, and driver updates.

item.title: February 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: Added Secure S3 Uploads, enhanced MapBox and MapsPeople integration, and new Work Locations feature, Improved visitor booking

item.title: June 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: Print concierge reports, refactored tables, authenticated user lists, support request types, map view POI creation, bug fixes.

item.title: Deployment Tooling: Kubernetes
item.description: Our new deployment tooling will help you get up and running with speed and security at the forefront.

item.title: New WorkMate Features: Experience Surveys, WFH Status & more
item.description: New features for our workplace suite, WorkMate, includes Experience Surveys, Resource Pay, WFH Status & Quick Booking.

item.title: User Interface Templates
item.description: Standard interface templates for any current and future partners to develop their own custom products.
